Constructor Detail

Die

public Die()
Defaults to a six-sided die. Initial face value is 1.

Die

public Die(int number_of_faces)
constructor Explicitly sets the size of the die. Defaults to a size of six if the parameter is invalid < MIN_FACES. Initial face value is random.
